sentences.english: Which shaketh the earth out of her place, and the pillars thereof tremble.
sentences.chinese: 他使地震動，離其本位，地的柱子就搖撼。

sentences.english: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations also of the hills moved and were shaken, because he was wroth.
sentences.chinese: 那時因他發怒，地就搖撼戰抖，山的根基也震動搖撼。

sentences.english: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations also of the hills moved and were shaken, because he was wroth.
sentences.chinese: 那時因他發怒，地就搖撼戰抖，山的根基也震動搖撼。

sentences.english: Winds, heavy rain, thunder, lightning shaking the love and support.
sentences.chinese: 狂風，暴雨，雷轟，電閃搖撼着我愛你的憑據。

sentences.english: And toss your brass tripod with somewhat childish wildness.
sentences.chinese: 並且幼稚野蠻地把你黃銅的三角架不停搖撼。

sentences.english: 7The earth trembled and quaked, and the foundations of the mountains shook; they trembled because he was angry.
sentences.chinese: 那時因他發怒，地就搖撼戰抖，山的根基也震動搖撼。

sentences.english: 7The earth trembled and quaked, and the foundations of the mountains shook; they trembled because he was angry.
sentences.chinese: 那時因他發怒，地就搖撼戰抖，山的根基也震動搖撼。

sentences.english: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea, tossed with waves: for the wind was contrary.
sentences.chinese: 那時船在海中，因風不順，被浪搖撼。

sentences.english: An terrible earthquake struck the area just after the clock struck twelve.
sentences.chinese: 時鐘剛打十二點，一場可怕的地震搖撼了這個地區。
